testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote with ora_inventory_dir parameter provided and oradb_inst_loc_data fact

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote with ora_inventory_dir parameter provided and oradb_inst_loc_data fact should contain Db_directory_structure[oracle structure 12.1.0.1_12.1.0.1_Linux-x86-64] with ora_inventory_dir => "/ora/inventory/dir/oraInventory"

oradb::installdb CentOS remote with ora_inventory_dir parameter provided and oradb_inst_loc_data fact should contain Oradb::Utils::Dborainst[database orainst 12.1.0.1_12.1.0.1_Linux-x86-64] with ora_inventory_dir => "/ora/inventory/dir/oraInventory"
